devdoc.details: A smart contract for managing public key authentication.      Users can register and verify their public keys to enable authentication.     The user data along with Public key is stored here

registerPublicKey(string,string,bytes).details: Registers a public key for the sender.

params.publicKey: The public key to register (must be a valid ECDSA public key). Requirements: - `email` cannot be empty. - `username` cannot be empty. - `publicKey` cannot be empty.

devdoc.title: PKIAuth
